nodes.title: Contributing: Request squashes to one commit for PRs
Add Jake Wharton's SDK location resolver code so it'll look in
Fix field count in integration with TeamCity
Don't display negative remaining totals for multidexed builds
Generate sunburst chart with package tree
Add percentage of total methods project is taking up to output.
Fix YAML bug, update copyright headers
Add YAML as an output format
Add description and group to generated DexMethodCountTasks
fix error apkOrDex can't be serialized.
Remove `exportAsCSV`, print the summary every time
Reduce non-existing mapping file statement to DEBUG
Fix minor bug in exportAsCSV (output was not written to file)
Add dex v39 magic header constant
Add dex v39 magic header constant
Update Tests to new testing strategy
Avoid using deprecated ApkVariant methods in AGP 3.3+
Add configuration to dynamically disable plugin
Turn Teamcity Integration on by default if running on Teamcity.
fix: Support Dex file format version 038
Use same gradle instance for both project, tests and integration tests
Update gradle for both modules, update versions for libraries
Fix renaming build output file name after initialize plugin
Add new Android SDK license hash to Travis build
Get variant outputs reflectively for AGP 2.X
[Gradle] - Add Javadoc support back in, turn off Java warnings
[Kotlin] - Convert files from groovy to Kotlin
[Gradle] - Use android block for the sdk + fix build
[Gradle] - Turn off java doc lint, turn java and groovy warnings to errors
[Gradle] - Clean up and fix master build
[Gradle] - Use double quotes for consistency through out the project
Avoid method-name duplication in PackageTree tests
Create dexcount extension before doing instant-run check
Fix typo that only Groovy would ever allow
#183: add classes count to output and summary file
Refactor to support renamed variant outputs
Remove use of uncapitalize() to fix users of Gradle < 3.5
Make Android Gradle plugin a compile-only dependency
Disable plugin for Instant Run builds
Make sure ZipFile instances are closed
Update dexdeps source code to handle dx version 37
[WIP] Move the main source to Kotlin
Write end to end test before moving to new language
Clean up Groovy + Add more tests
Bumps android gradle plugin version to work with AS 2.3
Fixes issue with passing ndkDir as a file instead of a path.
Including ndk_dir path into generated local.properties file
Check if the file exists before trying to extract a DexFile. If it doesn't exist just return an empty array.
Add runOnEachAssemble option to prevent task from running after assemble
Remove output annotations to opt out of Gradle caching
Add configurable slug for TeamCity statistics
Remove use of StyledTextOutput for Gradle 3 compatibility
Remove dependency on JDK-8-only Process methods.
Warn if Gradle is being run on Java 7 or below.
Don't count Instant Run builds by default
Tell javac to emit JRE7-compatible code
Replace usage of DefaultGroovyMethods#each with custom helper
Print plugin name and version when invoked with '--stacktrace'
Don't crash when parsing dex data fails
Fix ctor-call-within-branch failure on buggy JVMs, again
Add support for Android test modules
Work around apparent bug in Gradle 6.1 DirectoryProperty#file
Bump thrifty to 3.0.0, use its utils API instead of our homemade transports
Ensure extension field names don't clash with generated accessors
Use Commons IO instead of deprecated AntBuilder to copy directories
Remove Dokka - no Kotlin code left to document
Move task applicators to Java, remove Kotlin
Convert GeneratePackageTreeTask.kt to Java, Worker API
Port DexCountOutputTask to Java, Worker API
Move PrintOptions and DexCountException to Java
Move DexCountExtension to Java, use Property APIs to preserve groovy script syntax
Add support for AGP 7.0.0-beta05, withdraw support for 7.1.0-alpha02
Use the new @TempDir helper instead of managing temp dirs manually
Use ArtifactType.AAR in AGP 4.2+ instead of gross hack
Fix path to the .csv summary file in CI documentation
Bump gradle-maven-publish-plugin and add some pom attributes
Be more efficient when reading/writing thrift treegen data
Fix broken task-dependency chain under AGP < 3.6
The Kotlin plugin auto-adds an stdlib dependency, remove ours
Don't eagerly resolve all package tasks
Let gradle autogenerate task properties instead of injecting ObjectFactory
Try to use the same dx version as used in the project being counted
Remove references to and support for Gradle 2.X in ColorConsole.kt
Remove ThreeOhApplicator, rename ThreeThree to ThreeFour
Add mkdocs material site, contributing instructions, strip down readme
Use java-gradle-plugin to generate gradle-plugin resources
Skip plugin application if 0 < AGP version < 3.4.0
Multi-AGP version testing, major build-file revamp
Various small cleanups and refactorings following the big split
Remove .travis.yml and all references to travis CI
Add a string-pool to TreeGenOutput for great space savings
Split single counting task into treegen and output tasks
Add Thrift model for PackageTree serialization
Detect AAR minSdkVersion and pass it to dx
Add support for counting app bundles
Be a bit lazier in accessing variant output properties
Use ProjectLayout to get a Provider<RegularFile>
Allow counting of renamed output files
Try to speed up travis builds
Better property API usage, also minify in integration tests
Use Properties for task inputs and outputs
